replies.body: I'm a band person and this is awesome. Good work Riot!
And of course the USC Trojan Marching Band!
A big thank you to the The Spirit of Troy! They were amazing to work with!
I freaked when I heard this.
yeah they sounded great  am alex btw
As a league player I think this is cool, but as a musician I think all of this is freaking epic!!!!!!!!!!!!
IM FREAKING OUT SOOOO MUCH!!! I'm in color guard and this music would be so cool for a routine! I want to go to USC now so I can do this music.  This music sounds amazing!
We need to make this worlds log in screen music plz rito for silver scrapes

As a band guy, had to log in and comment how fucking cool this is. It's a shame that this type of thing doesn't get as much exposure as it should. Great work to the guys at Riot for getting something like this to happen. All I can say is that I want MORE!
Wow! Good job Riot and USC Trojan Marching Band! Il be listening to this during my league of legends games!
I was in the USC Trojan Marching Band 5 years ago and it has been 5 years since the first time I play League of Legends. Tears dropped when I watched the video. This is freaking awesome!
Please do more of this type of thing. Such a cool adaptation from the soundtrack to the band. Amazing stuff
Shame the UMD band wasn't able to play this, it sounds amazing!
